body: This PR looks good to me.
I think you should replace the screen snapshot.
cc @nsspw  You just need to edit one row to fix this issue.

yes,i am doing this
Good to know. Thanks. Pay attention for #478. When you are testing a controller effected by multi  annotations, you are possible to face the situation, which the pr tries to suppot.

And also add icons for each layers, e.g. DB, RPC_FRAMEWORK, HTTP, MQ, LOCAL.

Add a brief introduction section above the stack. like:
n DB spans (latency, x seconds), y HTTP-Server spans (latency, x seconds), etc.

We can do this just when query happens.

The constructor is the common constructor.
For spymemcached, there is a common constructor.
For Xmcached, there are some constructors!

@IluckySi you can adjust your codes at any time, dont hurry.
Already support multi headers for propagation.
I don't have plans to make a supported tracers list, but sounds good. maybe @mtwo or @bogdandrutu does?

If we can keep the spec stabilize, we can keep the right list. Otherwise, it is too hard. But having that list, we can tell the interop works among those tracers, right? That is the spec for. @mtwo, @bogdandrutu @adriancole

Hi, @IluckySi , as you can see, https://github.com/raphw/byte-buddy/issues/347#issuecomment-333947157 has been confirmed and fixed. So, it will release in 1.7.6 . 

Welcome you to work on this plugin after 1.7.6 released.
Since this pr can't be opened again. So I submit #488 to keep things in the loop.
Your meaning: other constructors are the overloads of the constructor which has a list parameter?
Yes!
Then you can ignore my point about the constructor.
Is there any problem?
Any other questions obout spymemcached?

You can find out there are other comments in this page, e.g. pom style, code comments, useless codes  etc. 

And you must make sure the Travis-CI passed.

You have an error in CI

```
[ERROR] The build could not read 1 project -> [Help 1]
[ERROR]   
[ERROR]   The project org.skywalking:apm-spymemcached-2.x-plugin:[unknown-version] (/home/travis/build/wu-sheng/sky-walking/apm-sniffer/apm-sdk-plugin/spymemcached-2.x-plugin/pom.xml) has 1 error
[ERROR]     Non-resolvable parent POM for org.skywalking:apm-spymemcached-2.x-plugin:[unknown-version]: Could not find artifact org.skywalking:apm-sdk-plugin:pom:3.2.2-2017 in central (http://repo.maven.apache.org/maven2) and 'parent.relativePath' points at wrong local POM @ line 6, column 10 -> [Help 2]
[ERROR] 
[ERROR] To see the full stack trace of the errors, re-run Maven with the -e switch.
[ERROR] Re-run Maven using the -X switch to enable full debug logging.
[ERROR] 
[ERROR] For more information about the errors and possible solutions, please read the following articles:
```

Check here: https://travis-ci.org/wu-sheng/sky-walking/builds/284654819?utm_source=github_status&utm_medium=notification

Sample comments only:
{@link MemcachedInstrumentation} represents a skywalking plugin define, which declares to intercept xxxx 's constructors and yyyy's methods.

I write this plugin as redis plugin......

```
   * {@link JedisClusterInstrumentation} presents that skywalking intercepts all constructors and methods of {@link
 * redis.clients.jedis.JedisCluster}. {@link JedisClusterConstructorWithHostAndPortArgInterceptor}
 * intercepts all constructor with argument {@link redis.clients.jedis.HostAndPort} and the other constructor intercept
 * by class {@link JedisClusterConstructorWithListHostAndPortArgInterceptor}. {@link JedisMethodInterceptor} intercept
 * all methods of {@link redis.clients.jedis.JedisCluster}
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 * {@link MemcachedInstrumentation} presents that skywalking intercept all constructors and methods of 
 * {@link net.spy.memcached.MemcachedClient}.
 * {@link XMemcachedConstructorWithInetSocketAddressListArgInterceptor} intercepts the constructor with
 * argument {@link java.net.InetSocketAddress}.
```

[![Coverage Status](https://coveralls.io/builds/13615093/badge)](https://coveralls.io/builds/13615093)

Coverage increased (+0.1%) to 17.763% when pulling **27d55a5d4fe68506eaa5d8553a14e2649ff474a7 on IluckySi:ilucky-spymemcached** into **6e3ad02d56962c5e6aeab568a7c25ab75b3b2132 on wu-sheng:master**.
Redis comments have their own problems, I hope the new comments are better than older ones. Besides, there are other things to adjust.
I can help you about English comments, but you need to fix other coding issues. And can you make sure that, this plugin is good for every version of 2.x

[![Coverage Status](https://coveralls.io/builds/13615134/badge)](https://coveralls.io/builds/13615134)

Coverage increased (+0.1%) to 17.763% when pulling **27d55a5d4fe68506eaa5d8553a14e2649ff474a7 on IluckySi:ilucky-spymemcached** into **6e3ad02d56962c5e6aeab568a7c25ab75b3b2132 on wu-sheng:master**.

For a plugin, there are a lot of small versions, and our approach is to adapt to one or several versions, which does not guarantee that all versions are available and that specific issues need to be addressed if other versions have specific problems! Thank you！

Understood, just try your best to make sure the best compatibility as you can, because you declared this for 2.x. I don't mean you should test in every released version, but you can pick some version to run the quick testes or from source code level to make sure it works.
And some review points are not adjusted yet. Others, LGTM.
Of course! I will try my best to test!
Provided in #478

”And some review points are not adjusted yet“
The pom.xml? or ?
https://github.com/wu-sheng/sky-walking/pull/481/files
All things remains in this page, except the constructor interceptor.

[![Coverage Status](https://coveralls.io/builds/13619017/badge)](https://coveralls.io/builds/13619017)

Coverage increased (+0.1%) to 17.763% when pulling **05a43d89853d950851119518708cba1c7db2f9db on IluckySi:ilucky-spymemcached** into **6e3ad02d56962c5e6aeab568a7c25ab75b3b2132 on wu-sheng:master**.

OK！
I have modified the style of the original code，pom.xml!

These two review comments:
https://github.com/wu-sheng/sky-walking/pull/481#discussion_r142000348
https://github.com/wu-sheng/sky-walking/pull/481#discussion_r142000364

“Is there any chance, allArguments.length !=0 or allArguments[0] is not a String? Redis plugin did this because there are many methods using the same interceptor. Are you doing the same thing?“
SpyMemcached is like jedis, many methods using the same interceptor.

> here are many methods using the same interceptor

I am aware of that, but, you can see, there is only `if` statement, no `else`. So what happen when it goes into `else`? Definitely no **DB_STATEMENT**. I don't think that is reasonable.
Just a simple not empty judgment. For all the methods that are currently intercepted, the first parameter cannot be null!

> allArguments.length > 0 && arguments[0] instanceof String

If this check also returns `true`, you should remove this. Because it makes the readers confused. As you known, we can't depend on this to make sure this plugin adapt other untested/unexpected versions. right?

> Object[] arguments = allArguments;

This statement seems useless, and you wrote that twice.
OK! I will fix it!

```
16,375  h -u origin ilucky-spymemcached -f
```
May be added to the wrong operation， I have deleted it!

@wu-sheng agreed, we should have a list. I think it makes sense to create during the first (v0.1 I guess) release ... do you agree?
@mtwo yes. and skywalking is going to change head format aftet 0.1 released.
Collector是否已经正常启动？从日志看来，服务端启动好像出现了问题。
查看了控制台，Collector启动正常，我是以docker形式运行Collector的，docker-compose.yml示例里有3个端口，collector.servers 这个是指向哪个端口为准的？会不会是这个问题？
Docker compose中配置的内容，默认只有在本地运行时有效。如果你要连接远程，可以联系下 @ascrutae ,或者独立部署下Collector。
好的，我先试一下独立部署Collector，再看看问题如果，然后可以了话，再尝试用docker，感谢回答
@qw2283345 master中的docker-compose.xml的中正准备发布的版本镜像，docker仓库中只有在这个版本发布的时候才能被同步。skywalking/sky-walking-ui这个在3.2版本的名字已经修改成skywalking/skywalking-ui
@qw2283345  你的collector和应用是部署在两台机器上还是部署在两台机器上？
@ascrutae 你好，collector和应用都是同一台机器上的
同时，是否有预警功能，达到一个阈值，能发邮件或者发短信

一次调用中，tomcat8和springmvc都属于EntrySpan，所以会进行自动合并。这是我们的一个性能优化策略。

@qw2283345 在最近项目经历过改名。请确认下镜像和docker-compose在最新版本是否能正常运行？
好的，欢迎有问题随时讨论，并反馈事情情况。目前准备使用的公司是？

> webui能否支持用户名和密码登录

这个属于多租户隔离，目前里程碑没有这方面的计划。

> 是否有预警功能，达到一个阈值，能发邮件或者发短信

告警支持是第一个主版本 3.3 的规划主要功能。欢迎关注和参与。
@qw2283345 独立部署Collector是否能够正常工作？
